original_text: The bronze piece on the top of one pillar was more than a metre high. It had rows of chains with images of pomegranates made from bronze all around it. The other pillar, with its rows of chains and pomegranates, was the same.
korean_text: 기둥 위에 놋머리가 있어 그 높이가 다섯 규빗이요 머리 사면으로 돌아가며 꾸민 망사와 석류가 다 놋이며 또 다른 기둥에도 이런 모든 것과 석류가 있었더라

sentences.original_text: The bronze piece on the top of one pillar
sentences.korean_translation: 한 기둥 꼭대기에 있는 놋쇠 조각은

sentences.original_text: was more than a metre high
with images of pomegranates made from bronze
with its rows of chains and pomegranates
